Html:
Hello Team,

2015-10-21 10:17:49.4884 + Error gathering information about logged on users: Exception calling "QueryAllSessionInformation" with "3" argument(s): "Unable to load DLL 'Wts.dll': The specified module could not be found. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E)" (RDS-Manager.psm1 line 608, char 85)

Raj.
